Dependencies are located here.

POCO				1.4.3p1					for Engine
CPUInfo				1.0.0					for Engine
tinyxml2			1.0.9					for Engine
OpenInput			0.2.3					for InputDriver_Win32
Bullet				2.81					for PhysicsDriver_Bullet
GLew				1.7.0					for RenderDriver_GL
CG					3.1 April 2012			for RenderDriver_GL
FreeImage			3.15.3					for RenderDriver_GL
OpenAL soft			1.15.1					for SoundDriver_OpenAL
alure				1.2						for SoundDriver_OpenAL
libogg				1.3.0					for SoundDriver_OpenAL
libvorbis			1.3.3					for SoundDriver_OpenAL
wxMSW				2.9.4					for Editor


The following will be compiled alongside the project:
POCO
OpenInput
alure
